alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; West Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 12:58PM MST until February 22 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 8 PM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Northwest Pinal County, West Pinal County and Apache Junction/Gold Canyon. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 8 PM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Difficult driving conditions, especially for larger vehicles traveling along roads with crosswinds. Light, unsecured objects may become airborne. Minor tree damage possible.
info.instruction: A Wind Advisory means that sustained wind speeds of between 30 and 40 mph are expected, or wind gusts of between 40 and 58 mph. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. In addition, strong winds over desert areas could result in briefly lowered visibilities to well under a mile at times in blowing dust or blowing sand. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Northwest Pinal County; West Pinal County
